house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1978 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include dining room, master bedroom. Features include view, private spa, patio, fireplace.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX On Tatum Realty RE/MAX On Tatum Realty
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Microwave
